author: sam60625
title: 2nd trip in 11 months
text:
Love the location, Love the staff, Love the roof, Love the price, Love the breakfast, .. Just Love.
1. Stone's throw from Roma Termini - Makes traveling by train to the airport so easy. (Great place to start & end your trip if you are traveling to other cities in between).
2. Staff - great listeners, super helpful - directions, recommendations, preferences, etc.. lovely.
3. Roof. - What can be wrong with a rooftop in Rome? Nada!
4. Price has been great for the value that you get - best kept sorta secret.
5. Breakfast - worth it, served in a pretty room, served by more nice staff, a fine selection of food.
Room Tip: maybe try to get a room that is a little bigger (but I haven't had a bad room) See more room tips
